kulami.gui

Class GameDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.gui.GameDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver

    public class GameDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObserver
    This class is notified when the game state changes and displays the game using a MapPainter.

    A GameDisplay sends user input events to a GameDisplayAdapter.

    Author:
    gordon
